title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline code assistants.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Next.js chat interface with file uploads and conversation history.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repo demonstrating function-calling/tool-use with Ollama models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight PyQt desktop GUI for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama as generator & embedder in pipelines.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich-terminal CLI with REPL, syntax highlighting, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or standalone scripts.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose examples for CPU/GPU inference.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Experimental distributed runner for splitting models across multiple hosts.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to cache and serve Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for retrieval.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.
